ABOUT US VIDEO
HELLO FROM
THE MOTOR CITY
15100 Keel St. Plymouth, MI 48170

Vanguard Motor Sales is the nation's premier classic and muscle car dealership. Since 2004, we have parked thousands of dreams in driveways. Our 80,000 sq. ft. indoor showroom is located in Plymouth, Michigan. Vanguard Motor Sales is dedicated to parking your dream in your driveway.

CALL US

ASK A QUESTION
248-974-9513
HOME
INVENTORY
SELL YOUR CAR
SERVICES
ABOUT US
CONTACT
WE WANT TO BUY YOUR CAR
SAFE TRANSACTION. QUICK PAYMENT.
WE ARE ALWAYS LOOKING FOR HIGH QUALITY VEHICLES
— MUSCLE CARS
— HOT RODS
— LOW MILEAGE LATE MODELS
— CLASSIC CARS
— PICKUPS / SUVS / 4X4S
— MODERN MUSCLE
— RESTOMODS
— PRO TOURING
— EXCITING CARS
WHO DO YOU KNOW WITH A HIGH QUALITY CAR FOR SALE?
ASK ABOUT OUR REFFERAL REWARD
HOW TO SELL YOUR CAR TO VANGUARD
CALL / TEXT / MAIL / EMAIL OUR BUY TEAM
